des:
Control your Hello Sure via Alexa, with your voice, or by creating routines that activate when a door contact opens or closes, to turn on lights or interact with other smart systems.
All door contacts, control and activation state of the root hub are supported, as well as the room temperature can be viewed.

You can handle Hello Sure using phrases like:
"Alexa, turn on home alarm"
"Alexa, turn off home alarm"

In order to connect Alexa to your Hello Sure hub, you need to have a My Hello Sure account and log in with one of the supported accounts (Microsoft, Google and Facebook). Subsequently, the activation requests authorization for access to the hub, identifies the devices and makes them available.

To deactivate the alarm, it is necessary to enter the device that represents the hub and activate the unlocking via PIN.
